title: Is it true that good karma always brings good? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hari om, you are asking a question as to z: “ Is it true that good Karma always brings good?”.Hari om. Good Karma is the gateway to even the abode of the God. It is only the good Karma that always brings good to you and your family, and life. Read sloka 2–40 of the Bhagavadgita and its meaning. You will know what good Karma can bring to you. Hari om.

Yes Good Karma will always bring good results. When a good seed is sown then a good tree germinates out of the seed. Divine decides what is the reward for good karma and how much good must be given to the one who does good Karma.
